name: TrashEmUp!
description:
TrashEmUp is a short but sweet game about cleaning up the environment! I made it in Pico-8 it took me about 3 hours, plus watching tutorials to make. So it's my very first Pico-8 game I made! Hope you enjoy don't forget to rate & comment please!

HOW TO PLAY:  LEFT AND RIGHT ARROW KEYS TO MOVE PLAYER 

PERMISSIONS:

  • THIS GAME IS FOR PERSONAL & COMMERCIAL PURPOSES ONLY!
  • YOU MAY MODIFY THIS GAME 
  • YOU MAY NOT SELL OR REDISTRIBUTE THIS GAME!
